scenario.name: PRESENCE re-SUB тест
scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "PRESENCE re-SUB тест" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Event: presence Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0

recv.action:
<ereg regexp="" search_in="body" check_it="true" assign_to="check"/>
<ereg regexp="open" search_in="body" check_it="true" assign_to="check"/>

scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "PRESENCE re-SUB тест" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]>;tag=[$subscribe_remote_tag] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Event: presence Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0

recv.action:
<ereg regexp="" search_in="body" check_it="true" assign_to="check"/>
<ereg regexp="open" search_in="body" check_it="true" assign_to="check"/>

<ereg regexp="" search_in="body" check_it="true" assign_to="check"/>
<ereg regexp="open" search_in="body" check_it="true" assign_to="check"/>

scenario.send: SIP/2.0 200 OK Via:[$not_via] From:[$not_from] To:[$not_to] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [$not_cseq] NOTIFY Content-Length: 0

recv.action:
<ereg regexp="" search_in="body" check_it_inverse="true" assign_to="dummy,check"/>
<ereg regexp="open" search_in="body" check_it="true" assign_to="check"/>

scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "PRESENCE re-SUB тест" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]>;tag=[$subscribe_remote_tag] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Event: presence Expires: 0 Content-Length: 0

SUBSCRIBE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "PRESENCE re-SUB тест" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] [authentication] CSeq: [cseq] SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Event: presence Accept: application/dialog-info+xml Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0

SUBSCRIBE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "PRESENCE re-SUB тест" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]>;tag=[$subscribe_remote_tag] Call-ID: [call_id] [authentication] CSeq: [cseq] SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Event: presence Accept: application/dialog-info+xml Expires: 0 Content-Length: 0

SUBSCRIBE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "PRESENCE re-SUB тест" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]>;tag=[$subscribe_remote_tag] Call-ID: [call_id] [authentication] CSeq: [cseq] SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Event: presence Accept: application/dialog-info+xml Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0
